error_details.explanation: Incorrect operand. The variable 'shots_per_day' (value: 200) was used instead of 'total_shots_per_week' (value: 800).

context.question: N/A
context.flawed_solution:
#### 1254
He shoots 200*4=<<200*4=800>>800 shots per week
He can recover 200*0.2=<<200*0.2=40>>40 of those arrows
So he uses 800-40=<<800-40=760>>760 arrows a week
The cost for those arrows would come out to 760*5.5=$<<760*5.5=4180>>4180 per week
His team pays for 4180*0.7=$<<4180*0.7=2926>>2926 of that
So he has to pay 4180-2926=$<<4180-2926=1254>>1254 per week for arrows
